title: [Large-Scale] Language Expression and Presentation Skills Enhancement Project for Professional Competency Development

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational presentation experience, understanding of job-related technical terminology, and basic language expression skills
context.additional_context: Experts in medical, legal, and technical fields collaborate via smartphones to perform presentation tasks reflecting real-world work scenarios. Focuses on discipline-specific terminology and effective communication strategies.

learning_goals: Within six months, learners establish a personalized presentation competency development plan using goal-setting and self-assessment tools, integrating specialized vocabulary selection and expression strategies by field.
By the third month, learners improve structured content organization and logical expression skills through a 15-minute job-related presentation incorporating peer feedback.

At course completion, learners achieve an average self-efficacy score of 4.0/5.0 across three presentation types (self-introduction, field expertise explanation, decision-making persuasion), utilizing field-specific terminology and persuasive language structures.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
